paper_abstract: We present a type of spherical neural network (SNN) with bounded sigmoidal activation function and study its interpolation capability. We find that the provided SNN can exactly interpolate the training samples. Furthermore, based on the special structure of the presented SNN, we can bound the interpolation error by the modulus of smoothness of the target function, which is different from the previous results on the spherical scattered data interpolation problem.
paper_title: Error Estimate for Spherical Neural Networks Interpolation
